locations.name: Ruaha National Park
locations.description: Overnight stays will be within or near this vast, remote park, likely at a safari lodge or camp, offering an immersive wildlife experience with large elephant herds and lion prides away from typical tourist crowds.

locations.name: Pemba Island
locations.description: Overnight stays will be on this tranquil island, likely at a beach resort or lodge, known for its lush landscape, pristine beaches, excellent diving/snorkelling, and a more authentic feel than Zanzibar.
